contents.content: UNIT 04 面试技巧 Interview Skills
Lesson 2 善于倾听 To Be a Good Listener
场景对话
杰克和玛丽在讨论如何在面试中做一个善于倾听的人。
Jack: It is quite important to be a good listener in the interview.
Mary: Listening carefully can show you understand and respect the speaker.
Jack: It can show your good attainment as well.
Mary: Besides, you can pick up some helpful information from the talk.
职场达人小技巧    如何做个好听众    求职面试不同于演讲，而是更接近于一般的交谈。交谈中，要认真聆听，做一个善于倾听的人，这不但可以体现出求职者的良好素养，也可以给面试官留下好的印象。
Jack: And your statement should be clear and brief to the point.
Mary: Never should you interrupt on a unfamiliar topic.
Jack: Sure, in order not to leave a bad impression on the interviewer.
为了表示你已听懂，或是对谈话内容很感兴趣，可以面带微笑注视对方，并且在适当的时候点头，或是提问、答话。口齿要清晰，音量要适度，答话要简练。一般情况下不要随意打断对方的问话或是抢答，否则会给人留下急躁、鲁莽、不礼貌的印象。问话完毕，如果听不懂可以礼貌地请求重复。对于不熟悉或是不能回答的问题，不要轻易插言，含糊其辞或是胡吹乱侃都可能会导致面试失败。对重复的问题也要有耐心，千万不要表现出不耐烦。
Mary: Additionally, don't show any impatience to a repeated topic.
Jack: Don't be absent-minded even when you are not interested in the talk.
Mary: In a word, any impolite behavior should be avoided in the listening.
当然，也要随时注意对方的反应。如果对方心不在焉，可能表示他没有兴趣，你就要设法转移话题；皱眉可能表示你的言行举止有不当之处。这时候，就要相应地做出调整，才能取得好的面试效果。
必背例句

contents.title: 你要学会在面试中做一个善于倾听的人。
contents.answer: You should learn to be a good listener in the interview.

contents.title: 认真倾听是最起码的尊重。
contents.answer: Listening to the speaker carefully is the least respect.

contents.title: 关于这个职位，面试官对你说了些什么？
contents.answer: What have the interviewer told you about the position?

contents.title: 倾听时要面带微笑注视对方。
contents.answer: You should make eye contact with the speaker with a smile while listening.

contents.title: 随意插话会给面试官留下不好的印象。
contents.answer: Interrupting will leave the interviewer a bad impression.

contents.title: 对于重复的问题要保持耐心。
contents.answer: You should maintain patience for a repeated question.

contents.title: 在面试中不要表现出心不在焉。
contents.answer: Never should you be absent-minded in the interview.

contents.title: 即使对讨论的话题不感兴趣，也要保持风度。
contents.answer: You should keep your demeanor even when you are not interested in the topic.

contents.title: 点头表示你同意说话者的观点。
contents.answer: You can nod to show your agreement with the speaker.

contents.title: 倾听时要学会进行眼神交流。
contents.answer: You should learn to use eye contact while listening.

contents.content: 核心词汇总
as well 也，又
first of all 首先，第一
pick up 得到，偶然学会
to the point 切题

contents.hanyi: adj. 缺席的；心不在焉的
